WorkItem.Description:
If I close Rawr v2.2.5 with the Healadin module active, it won't open any more (closes itself without an visible error after the splash screen).
I tried clean reinstalls and rebooting but nothing helped. Only deleting the Rawr folder in Local Settings\Application Data fixed the issue.
 
Way to reproduce it:
1. Clean install of Rawr v2.2.5, Rawr folder in Local Settings\Application Data deleted.
2.a. Open a existing character XML file containing a Healadin character.
or
2.b. Switch to the Healadin module manually.
3. Close Rawr.
4. Try to open it again. Doesn't work, it closes itself after the splash screen.
 
I also noticed that I will sometimes just crash (without visible error) when Rawr is already started and I try to switch to the Healadin module. But I couldn't find a way to reliably reproduce this yet.
 
I didn't had this problem in v2.2.4.
Using Windows XP Prof. SP3 with .NET 3.5 SP1

Comments.Message:
Duplicate of an Issue that was created 8 hours after mine?
Weird Issue handling.
